item.title: Google CEO Pichai struggled to navigate a pressure-filled year
item.description: Google CEO Pichai notched some AI wins but struggled to navigate a pressure-filled year.

item.title: OpenAI says it needs 'more capital than weâ€™d imagined' as it lays out for-profit plan
item.description: OpenAI said in a blog post Friday that heading into 2025, "we have to becomean enduring company," which requires changing its structure.

item.title: Richard Parsons, former Time Warner CEO, dies at age 76
item.description: Richard Parsons helped Time Warner divorce from AOL after what was considered the worst takeover in history.

item.title: Trump's 'border czar' says family detention centers could play a role in deportation effort

item.title: Recalled Costco eggs may cause severe illness due to salmonella, FDA warns
item.description: No illnesses have been reported yet. It can take several weeks for cases to be identified as part of a food outbreak.
